description: Developed a full-stack fleet management application using Flutter and Firebase.
Implemented features for real-time tracking and data analysis to enhance operational efficiency.
Contributed to UI/UX design with Figma to ensure a user-friendly interface and seamless user experience.
Created a machine learning model for real-time weapon detection using Python and OpenCV.
Utilized TensorFlow for model training to achieve high accuracy in threat identification.
Enhanced security measures with a model adaptable to diverse scenarios and environmental conditions.
Completed a virtual internship focusing on Salesforce administration and CRM process optimization.
Worked on various administrative tasks and gained practical experience with Salesforce tools.
Contributed to improving CRM processes and learned about Salesforce administration.
